question: India donated over 1.8 million N95 masks to the Philadelphia city, located in which country?
explanation:
India has recently donated 1.8 million N95 masks to Philadelphia, the largest city in the US state of Pennsylvania, to help tackle COVID-19.
This move is seen as an example of strong -US partnership in the health sector. The city Mayor had earlier requested India for the supply of masks to be used by frontline workers. It is also the sixth-most populous city in the United States.
